name: Contract.term.offer.decision
title: Contract.term.offer.decision
purpose: Data Elements are defined for each element to assist in questionnaire construction etc

element.definition: Type of choice made by accepting party with respect to an offer made by an offeror/ grantee.
element.requirements: In some policy or contract contexts, the "offer" is made by an offeror wishing to be the "grantee" of the offer topic by the grantor.  From this perspective, the grantor is the "offeree".

binding.description: The type of decision made by a grantor with respect to an offer made by a grantee.

mapping.map: ActCode: _ActConsentDirective [abstract term] Description: Specifies the type of agreement between one or more grantor and grantee in which rights and obligations related to one or more shared items of interest are allocated. Usage Note: Such agreements may be considered "consent directives" or "contracts" depending on the context, and are considered closely related or synonymous from a legal perspective.
